item.description:
Everyone is invited to the Lansdowne Pub on August 18th for a Music Marathon, an entire day of music featuring The Replicas, Flying by Feel, Close to Home, Chris Mathison, Dirty Hit, Ken Freeman, Bearfight and Dalton and the Sheriffs! We will be accepting donations to benefit the ALS Multidisciplinary Clinic at Mass General Hospital.

The first band goes on at noon, so stop by and help us Strike out ALS!

Please email loshea@lyonsgroup.com with questions or make a reservation!
item.name: Music Marathon 4 Charity
